alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island North; Big Island Southeast; Kipahulu; Maui Windward West; Molokai Southeast; Molokai Windward; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued February 16 at 3:35PM HST until February 18 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR EAST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI AND BIG ISLAND... .Southeast winds will strengthen and maintain through the weekend. Local wind waves and upstream swell generated by a strong high pressure system will bring surf above advisory levels through Saturday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM FRIDAY TO 6 PM HST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Surf 8 to 12 feet. * WHERE...East facing shores of Maui and Big Island. * WHEN...From 6 AM Friday to 6 PM HST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
